articles.author: Anne Sraders
articles.title: Coronavirus fears send markets plunging, erasing the Dow’s gains for the year
articles.description: Even as the virus rattles investors, one analyst predicts it could actually be "a healthy correction."

articles.author: Ellen McGirt
articles.title: The racist response to the coronavirus
articles.description: Asian people of all nationalities are being targeted, isolated, and harassed in familiar ways.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: China is keeping two thirds of its economy shut next week to curb coronavirus spread
articles.description: More than a dozen Chinese provinces announced an extension of the current Lunar New Year holiday by more than a week as the nation attempts to halt the spread of the novel coronavirus.

articles.author: Naomi Xu Elegant
articles.title: As coronavirus spreads, facemasks become a ‘symbol of protection’—and a lighting rod for fear
articles.description: The coronavirus outbreak is sparking global shortages of facemasks and in some countries, xenophobic backlash.

articles.author: David Meyer
articles.title: Coronavirus: The economic effects are looking scarier by the day
articles.description: China's economy looks set to take a significant hit, and the timing is really not good.

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: The coronavirus is already disrupting the global supply chain, starting with these commodities
articles.description: The short-term impact of coronavirus on the global supply chain can be measured in commodity prices, which are down across the board in the past two weeks.
